Name: Sand Castle
About the game: Sand Castle is a short visual novel half an hour long. This is a story about a guy and a girl. Their past and present. Both sad and happy moments of their life together. Take this chance to relax after a hard day at work and enjoy a cosy evening while playing a nice game. So what are you waiting for? Feast your eyes on the peaceful vastness of the ocean, give your ear to the soothing sound of splashing waves, expose your skin to the summer breeze. Time stopped here so no need to hurry. Feel free to sympathize with the characters and ponder the common values of life. Features: • Three dates in one. • Two endings following a difficult choice. • Nice soundtrack and beautiful backgrounds. • Gives a favorable psychological effect.
